Title: Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts
Notes: "Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts" (地震灾害与减灾科普挂图) is a 12-poster series published in 1992 by the National Seismological Administration.Entitled "Government leadership, comprehensive defense" (政府领导综合防御), this poster shows the government stepping in, organizing relief efforts.
